name: gopher-holes-unlimited
description: This is an example application that uses OAS3.0 to define an API. It is an fictional business to track gophers and holes

scripts.deploy: sam build -t template.yaml --parallel && sam package --output-template-file packaged.yaml --s3-bucket gopherholesunlimited --profile home && sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name gopher-holes-unlimited --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --profile home
scripts.diagram: cfn-dia draw.io -t template.yaml -o infrastructure/diagram.drawio -c && drawio infrastructure/diagram.drawio -o infrastructure/diagram.png
